1. It takes courage to grow up and become who you really are
2. Your self-worth is determined by you. You don't have to depend on someone telling you who you are
3. Keep your face always toward the sunshine, and shadows will fall behind you.
4. Nothing is impossible. The word itself says 'I'm possible!
5. Attitude is a little thing that makes a big difference
6. To bring about change, you must not be afraid to take the first step. We will fail when we fail to try.
7. All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.
8. Don't sit down and wait for the opportunities to come. Get up and make them.
9. Champions keep playing until they get it right.
10. I am lucky that whatever fear I have inside me, my desire to win is always stronger.
1. You have to believe in yourself when no one else does.
2. The most important thing is to enjoy your life‚Äîto be happy‚Äîit‚Äôs all that matters.
3. Spread love everywhere you go. Let no one ever come without leaving happier.
4. Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
5. I can accept failure, everyone fails at something. But I can‚Äôt accept not trying.
6. It does not matter how slowly you go, as long as you do not stop.
7. If you can do what you do best and be happy, you are further along in life than most people.
8. You can be everything. You can be the infinite amount of things that people are.
9. When you change your thoughts, remember to also change your world.
10. The more you know who you are, and what you want, the less you let things upset you.
1. Nobody is born an expert.
2. Life is meant to be lived out loud.
3. Unique is good.
4. Get out of your own way
5. The only person you have to please is yourself.
6. You won't find your future following someone else's roadmap.

8. If you listen to the naysayers, you'll never find out what you can really do.

10. Take joy in the journey.
